name: sablier
description: Sablier is a self-hosted tool for managing time-based governance tasks for DAOs. It automates schedules, streams, and proposal processes through an intuitive web UI.
features: Dynamic scaling: Automatically start and stop containers based on traffic to reduce resource usage and costs.
Reverse proxy integration: Works seamlessly with Traefik and other proxies to manage container lifecycle.
Session persistence: Maintains user sessions during container startup with customizable loading pages.
Multi-strategy support: Choose between blocking, dynamic, or throttle strategies for different workload patterns.
Resource optimization: Reduces idle container overhead by shutting down unused services after configurable timeouts.
Health monitoring: Tracks container health and readiness before routing traffic to ensure reliability.
Custom themes: Personalize loading screens with custom HTML, CSS, and branding during container startup.
API control: Programmatically manage container states and scaling policies via REST API.
Metrics export: Exposes Prometheus metrics for monitoring scaling events and container lifecycle.
Label-based config: Configure scaling behavior through simple Docker labels without complex configuration files.
Multi-container support: Manage multiple services simultaneously with independent scaling policies.
Graceful shutdown: Ensures proper cleanup and state preservation when stopping containers.
